column1: geniave perkey felts| geniave perkey felts age 68 of cave city died saturday
column3: 2015 at a batesville hospital. she was born november 1
column5: arkansas to john olen and syble marie (johnson) perkey. she was a homemaker and a member of the hillcrest baptist church in cave city. she was preceded in death by her parents and one sister
column6: etta faye ashley. survivors include her husband of 49 years
column7: roy felts of the home; two sons
column8: kevin felts and jeffery felts both of cave city; one daughter
column9: felicia ferrell and husband tony of batesville; one brother
column10: arbra perkey of cave city; four sisters
column12: carolyn mc. cracken and becky sisk all of cave city and venita jackson of batesville; seven grandchildren
column18: kallie davis and tyler bramlet; three great grandchildren
column20: connor felts and luke felts; several nieces and nephews and a host of other relatives and friends. funeral services will be tuesday
column22: 2015 at 2:00 p. m. at the maxville missionary baptist church located at cave city with bro. boyce johnson and randy smith officiating. burial will follow in the eutopia cemetery located at cave city with arrangements by qualls funeral home of cave city. visitation will be monday
column24: 2015 from 6:00 until 8:00 p. m. at the church. pallbearers will be kevin felts
column28: jordan felts and tyler bramlett. honorary pallbearers are jeff felts
